segments.text: I feel a wave of irritation as I watch the woman continue to dry those dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t she sense the chaos developing behind her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to get themselves hurt, and it’s infuriating to see her so oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of the water overflowing drives me mad; it’s such a mess!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how easily this could turn into a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tranquility of the garden feels like a sharp contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t break anything when they finally tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR
